org.jooby

Interface View.Engine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Renderer
    Enclosing class:
    View

    public static interface View.Engine
extends Renderer
    Special body serializer for dealing with View. Multiples view engine are supported too. In order to support multiples view engine, a view engine is allowed to throw a FileNotFoundException when a template can't be resolved it. This gives the chance to the next view resolver to load the template.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    edgar

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.jooby.Renderer

        Renderer.Context

    • Method Detail

      • render

        default void render(Object value,
                    Renderer.Context ctx)
             throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Renderer
        Render the given value and write the response (if possible). If no response is written, the next renderer in the chain will be invoked.
        Specified by:
        render in interface Renderer
        Parameters:
        value - Object to render.
        ctx - Rendering context.
        Throws:
        Exception - If rendering fails.

      • render

        void render(View viewable,
            Renderer.Context ctx)
     throws FileNotFoundException,
            Exception
        Render a view or throw a FileNotFoundException when template can't be resolved it..
        Parameters:
        viewable - View to render.
        ctx - A rendering context.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - If template can't be resolved.
        Exception - If view rendering fails.
